scripts.dev:dashboard: set -a && eval $(supabase status --output env) && set +a && open $STUDIO_URL
scripts.dev:email-server: set -a && eval $(supabase status --output env) && set +a && open $INBUCKET_URL
scripts.build:types: supabase gen types typescript --local --schema public > ../app/src/types/supabase.ts && prettier --write ../app/src/types/supabase.ts
